Description: Fragment of a polychrome tomb-painting representing funerary offerings and with four vertical registers of polychrome painted hieroglyphs surviving.
Curator's comments: Published: PM I Part 2, p. 817. Full publication: R. Parkinson, The Painted Tomb-Chapel of Nebamun: Masterpieces of Ancient Egyptian Art in the British Museum (London: British Museum Press 2008). A. Middleton and K. Uprichard (ed.), The Nebamun Wall paintings: Conservation, Scientific Analysis and Display at the British Museum (London: Archetype 2008).
